# Past Reports

```{python}
#| echo: false

import os

# --- START DEBUGGING ---
print("--- Debugging Archive Page ---")
print(f"Current Directory: {os.getcwd()}")
print(f"Contents of 'docs/': {os.listdir('docs')}")
# --- END DEBUGGING ---

archive_dir = "docs/archive"

# only proceed if folder exists
if os.path.isdir(archive_dir):
    print(f"Contents of '{archive_dir}': {os.listdir(archive_dir)}") # Added another debug print
    reports = sorted(os.listdir(archive_dir), reverse=True)
    for r in reports:
        # The link is now relative to the index.html page inside archive/
        print(f"- [{r}]({r})")
else:
    print(f"'{archive_dir}' NOT FOUND or is not a directory.") # More explicit message

```
